INVALID_CREDENTIALS: Invalid credentials: The email or password you entered is incorrect. Please verify and try again.
LOGIN_SUCCESSFULLY: Login successful: You have successfully logged in. Welcome!
LOGOUT_ALREADY_DONE: Logout already completed: the token was already invalidated or expired.
TOKEN_REFRESHED: Token refreshed: Your access token has been successfully refreshed.
REGISTRATION_SUCCESSFULLY: Registration successful: You have been successfully registered. Welcome aboard!
